DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether a procedure was performed to determine the presence of measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc_Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: A characteristic that can be objectively measured and serves as an indicator for normal biologic processes, pathogenic processes, state of health or disease, the risk for disease development and/or prognosis, or responsiveness to a particular therapeutic intervention.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Data Not Available Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, not applicable, or that the data is not present in the original source.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

Concepts.definition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes, No, or Unknown Response Source Data Not Available Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.:Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.
Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: MCL:Molecular and Cellular Characterization of Screened Lesions
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/24/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review due to reuse. 1/3/21 jk Added PV "Not reported" for Clinical Core dataset. 10/29/19 jk released per MCL SME (Maureen/Kristen) review.  9/12/19 jk revised definition to reflect the null values for MCL Breast core content.   3/12/17 jk created as a Standard MCL VD.

ReferenceDocuments.name: MCL-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Name of biomarker tested will be in organ specific CDE listing.

DataElement.origin: MCL:Molecular and Cellular Characterization of Screened Lesions
DataElement.changeDescription: 2/25/21 jk Released per SME (KA) review and approval. 1/4/21 jk Versioned CDE to support Clinical Core DD PVs.  1/22/20 jk removed from MCL Biospecimen CSI per MCL SME. 1/31/19 jk classified for MCL PCA Specimen tracking system. 7/16/18 jk released per Kristen Anton; chg reg to "Qualified".  6/11/18 jk added application status. 5/17/17 jk Created for MCL Core.
